Socket definitions


Defines

#define Platform_SOCKET_FMT   "%d"
#define Platform_SOCKET_DISPLAY(sock)   ((sock).socketFd)

Detailed Description

Ttransitional; see IPDR_SocketHandle

Define Documentation

#define Platform_SOCKET_DISPLAY (  sock   )     ((sock).socketFd)
 

Macro to get the contents of the socket for output using #IPDR_SOCKET_FMT:
printf("socket: " IPDR_SOCKET_FMT "\\n", IPDR_SOCKET_DISPLAY(sock))

#define Platform_SOCKET_FMT   "%d"
 

The output format to use with printf when displaying a socket, used with #IPDR_SOCKET_DISPLAY:
printf("socket: " IPDR_SOCKET_FMT "\\n", IPDR_SOCKET_DISPLAY(sock)).
